data.title: Man Unlimited
data.text:
Season 1*Spider-Man, travels to a new world (Counter-Earth) to battle his old enemies (Carnage and Venom) from Earth, and free humans from the social order imposed by a mysterious and evil High Evolutionary.

WORLDS APART, PART 1 (10.02.99) (12.02.2000)

Cast: Peter Parker as Spider-Man, John Jameson, Jonah J. Jameson, Mary Jane

Cameo: Nick Fury

Villains: Venom, Carnage, Machine Men, Bestials, Knights of Wundagore [Lord Tiger, Sir Ram, Lady Ursula, Lady Vermin]

1st Cameo: High Evolutionary

Story: When he sees Venom and Carnage stow away on John Jameson's space shuttle to Counter-Earth, Peter Parker designs a Nano-Tech costume with new features and hijacks a shuttle to go after them. Landing on Counter-Earth, an Earth-like world ruled by the High Evolutionary, he's captured by the Knights of Wundagore, who prepare to take genetic samples of him.

Spider-Trivia: Peter Parker didn't design his new costume by himself. Who else helped him?

WORLDS APART, PART 2 (10.09.99) (12.09.2000)

1st Cast Appearance: Human Revolutionaries (John Jameson, Git Hoskins)

1st Cameo: Shayne, Naoko Yamada-Jones

Villains: Carnage, Venom

1st Appearance: High Evolutionary

Story: Spider-Man escapes from the Knights with the help of the Human Revolutionaries, freedom fighters led by John Jameson. He learns that Counter-Earth is ruled by Beastials -- human-animal hybrids created by the High Evolutionary -- who use Machine Men to enforce their laws. When Carnage and Venom, pursuing their own mysterious agenda, attack the revolutionaries' Head Quarter, Spidey helps drive them off. Jameson invites Spidey to join his cause, but Spidey only wants to convince him to return to Earth.

WHERE EVIL NESTS (10.16.99) (12.16.2000) (01.06.01)

Cast: Naoko Yamada-Jones, Shayne

1st Appearance: Goblin

Villains: Bio-Mass, Venom, Carnage

Story: Settling in on Counter-Earth, Peter gets to know his new landlady, Naoko Yamada-Jones, and her son, Shayne. When Shayne is captured by the Bio-Mass, an ameba-like creature under the control of Venom and Carnage, Spidey and a mysterious vigilante called the Goblin must rescue him. Afterwards, Peter gets a job as a news photographer at the Daily Byte.

DEADLY CHOICES (12.23.00)

Cast: Git Hoskinss, Human Revolutionary

Villains: Sir Ram, Knights of Wundagore

Story: Git Hoskins, a Human Revolutionary who has unusual powers due to being experimented on by the High Evolutionary, steals a canister of deadly mutagen from Sir Ram's laboratory. Spidey and the Knights must reluctantly join forces to find Git, because the canister has a failsafe that will detonate a nuclear charge to prevent the mutagen from infecting Counter-Earth.

STEEL COLD HEART (01.13.01)

Cast: X-51, Shayne, Human Revolutionaries

Villains: Knights of Wundagore

Story: Spidey and Shayne befriend X-51, a Machine Man who has become sentient and no longer wants to serve the High Evolutionary. X-51 is hunted by the Knights of Wundagore and the Human Revolutionaries, who want to exchange him for one of their own held prisoners. Spidey learns that the exchange is a double-cross and prevents it, and X-51 joins the revolutionary forces.

ENTER THE HUNTER! (02.03.01)

Cast: Karen O'Malley

Villains: Sir Ram, The Hunter

Story: Sir Ram hires the Hunter, a human mercenary, to hunt down Spider-Man. As bait, the Hunter kidnaps Karen O'Malley, and during the course of this he learns Spidey's secret identity. Spider-Man must face the Hunter in his high-tech lair, rescue Karen, and somehow convince him that he's not really Peter Parker.

CRY VULTURE (02.10.01)

Cast: Naoko

1st Appearance: Vulture

Villains: Sir Ram

1st Appearance: Firedrake

Story: A friend of Naoko's is kidnapped, and Spider-Man sets out to save him. When Spidey learns that the victim is going to be used as a human lab rat, getting to him becomes a race against time -- which is complicated by the appearance of two new Beastial foes, Firedrake and Counter-Earth's very own version of the Vulture!

ILL MET BY MOONLIGHT (02.17.01)

Cast: Rebels

1st Appearance: John Jameson as Manwolf

Villains: Electro

Story: The rebels want to put a lethal power plant out of business, and Spider-Man agrees to help. Little does he know that not only will he have to face off against Counter-Earth's Beastial Electro, but also against John Jameson's alter ego, Manwolf, as well!

SUSTENANCE (03.03.01)

Cast: Goblin, Rejects

Villains: High Evolutionary

Story: Aided by the Goblin, Spider-Man searches for the spaceship that can take him back to Earth. Together, they find the ship and a horrifying secret -- the dark fate of the High Evolutionary's genetic failures, the Rejects.

FAMILY MATTERS (03.10.01)

Cast: Bromley

Villains: High Evolutionary, Sir Ram

Story: The deepest consequences of the Beastials' subjugation of the human race are faced by Bromley, one of the most dedicated Counter-Earth rebels, when, in an attempt to free his brother from the High Evolutionary, he agrees to betray Spider-Man.

ONE IS THE LONELIEST NUMBER (03.17.01)

Cast:

Villains: Venom, Carnage

Story: Spider-Man faces one of the gravest challenges of his life when he discovers that Eddie Brock and his Symbiote have been separated. Instead of celebrating the end of Venom, Spidey must face off against Carnage and re-create his toughest foe, or Brock will die.

THE SINS OF OUR FATHERS (03.24.01)

Cast: Karen O'Malley

Villains: High Evolutionary, Knights of Wundagore

Story: When Karen O'Malley is captured by the High Evolutionary, Spider-Man and the rebels come to her rescue, storming Wundagore Castle and going head to head with the Knights of Wundagore. But all is not as it seems, because the High Evolutionary's interest in Karen is more than an attempt to defeat the rebels' cause -- it's personal.

DESTINY UNLEASHED, PART 1 (03.31.01)

Cast: Human Revolutionary

Villains: High Evolutionary, Venom, Carnage
